command_tests.stdout:
usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory [-h]
                                      {list,add,find,recall,smart-recall,clean}
                                      ...

positional arguments:
  {list,add,find,recall,smart-recall,clean}
                        记忆操作
    list                列出记忆
    add                 添加记忆到系统
    find                基础记忆搜索
    recall              智能记忆召回
    smart-recall        高级智能记忆召回
    clean               清理记忆

options:
  -h, --help            show this help messa

usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory list [-h]
                                           [--category {context,decision,pattern,issue,learning}]
                                           [--limit LIMIT] [--recent]
                                           [--tags TAGS]

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --category {context,decision,pattern,issue,learning}
                        过滤记忆类别
  --limit LIMIT         显示数量限制
  --recent              仅显示最近的记忆
  --tags TA

usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory add [-h]
                                          [--category {context,decision,pattern,issue,learning}]
                                          [--tags TAGS]
                                          [--importance IMPORTANCE]
                                          content

positional arguments:
  content               记忆内容(必需)

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --category {context,decision,pattern,issue,learning}

usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory find [-h] [--limit LIMIT]
                                           [--category {context,decision,pattern,issue,learning}]
                                           query

positional arguments:
  query                 搜索关键词

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --limit LIMIT         结果数量限制
  --category {context,decision,pattern,issue,learning}
                        限制搜索类别

usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory recall [-h] [--context CONTEXT]
                                             [--limit LIMIT]
                                             [--min-relevance MIN_RELEVANCE]
                                             query

positional arguments:
  query                 召回查询

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --context CONTEXT     当前上下文信息
  --limit LIMIT         最大返回数量
  --min-relevance MIN_RELEVANCE
                        最低相关

usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory smart-recall [-h] [--context CONTEXT]
                                                   [--limit LIMIT]
                                                   [--include-patterns]
                                                   [--priority-recent]
                                                   [--detailed]
                                                   query

positional arguments:
  query               智能召回查询

options:
  -h, --help          show this

usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory clean [-h] [--days DAYS]
                                            [--category {context,decision,pattern,issue,learning}]
                                            [--confirm] [--dry-run]

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --days DAYS           清理N天前的记忆
  --category {context,decision,pattern,issue,learning}
                        仅清理指定类别
  --confirm             跳过确认提示
  --dry-run             仅预览，不实际删除

command_tests.stderr:
usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory [-h]
                                      {list,add,find,recall,smart-recall,clean}
                                      ...
enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory: err

usage: enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory [-h]
                                      {list,add,find,recall,smart-recall,clean}
                                      ...
enhanced_cli.py pateoas memory: err
